title: How much is the starting salary of Wrightsville Beach Police officers in comparision to Wilmington Police officers?
text:
A police officer I in Wrightsville Beach makes $33,480.72 a year. A
Wilmington police officer starts at $34,004.88.



To see other salaries, visit our How Much We Earn database at
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/99999999/ARTICLES/907249981
